Package com.company

Class Inventory

java.lang.Object
com.company.Inventory
public class Inventory
extends java.lang.Object
This class represents an inventory. It contains a HashMap of products and it maps each product to its stock in the inventory. This class provides methods to add or remove products from the list or change the number of remaining items.
Since:
4-15-2021
Version:
1.0
Author:
KIMIA

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Inventory()
    Inventory's constructor creates a new HashMap for the products and allocates memory.

    This method finds a product by a given index.

      public java.util.HashMap<Product,​java.lang.Integer> getTotalProducts()
      Getter for the HashMap of products.
      Returns:
      the HashMap of products and the stock of each product

    • getStock

      public java.lang.Integer getStock​(Product product)
      This method finds the stock of the given product
      Parameters:
      product - the product to find it's number
      Returns:
      the stock of the given product in the inventory, or null if the product didn't exist

    • add

      public void add​(Product product, int stock)
      Adds a product to the hashMap and maps the product to the given integer.
      Parameters:
      product - the product to add to the HashMap
      stock - the number of the products to add

    • remove

      public void remove​(Product product)
      Removes a product from the HashMap.
      Parameters:
      product - the product to remove from the HashMap

    • changeStock

      public void changeStock​(Product product, int stock)
      This method changes the number of the remaining items of the given product.
      Parameters:
      product - the product to change its remaining items
      stock - the new number of items for the product

    • getProductByIndex

      public Product getProductByIndex​(int index)
      This method finds a product by a given index.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the wanted product
      Returns:
      the wanted product found in the HashMap, or null if the index is out of boundary

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      This method converts all the information of inventory into a String in json format.
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object
      Returns:
      a String containing the information of each product inside the inventory
